%S A048428 475,144003,180275,684475,940046,2593211,4750782,4753125,9600192,

%N A048428 a(n)^2 is a square composed of three '2 digit' overlapping subsquares.
%C A048428 Subsquares with leading and/or trailing zeros not included. Subsquares must be at least 3 digits long.
